channel.title: Any problems with your server? post here!

post any of your server help here on my chain post, and people woth post a reply right to you.

item.title: Any problems with your server? post here!
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:7, topic:109247”]Bl4ck try like this. =p

else if(useItemID == 7535 && atObjectID == 4090) { deleteItem(7535, getItemSlot(7535), 1); addItem(Item.randomphat(), 1); }[/quote]

Tried it like that… Same thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Any problems with your server? post here!

item.title: Any problems with your server? post here!

item.description:
@xirus_x wrote:

i have this error when i run my server

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
9"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:29)

item.title: Any problems with your server? post here!
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

I am having some difficulty using item on object.
I will explain what I mean.

My code is:

			        else if(useItemID == 7535 && atObjectID == 4090)
				{
				addItem(Item.randomphat(), 1);
				deleteItem(7535, getItemSlot(7535), 1);
				}

Sometimes[2/10] when I use the item on the object, it gives me the desired effect.
Sadly, most of the time it just disconnects that player.

  1. Any ideas what is wrong, and if so how do I fix it?
  2. Is there another way to delete that item?

I created randomphat.
That is not the problem.
There is no randomPhat or randomPHat in my source…
And when it does work it does delete item 7535 and adds a random item.
But 90% of the time it just disconnects me…
I know how to code buddy. I just want to see if there is a way for 100% of the time it works.

Read full topic
